import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { faGithub, faLinkedin, faTwitter } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent { faTwitter = faTwitter; faGithub = faGithub; faLinkedIn = faLinkedin; }
